Entries.Introduction:
Oh, a stranger! My name's Vincent.#$b#Mommy says not to talk to strangers... But you seem okay.
  #$q 101/102 ABDLChild_fallback#%Would you be comfortable seeing ABDL dialogue from Vincent and Jas?
  #$r 101 0 ABDLChild_Yes#Yes, I am comfortable with that.
  #$r 102 0 ABDLChild_No#No, I would like to see the original dialogue.
Entries.ABDLChild_Yes: %The more hearts you have with them the more ABDL dialogue there will be.
Entries.ABDLChild_No: %Okay. All the original lines will be unchanged, and they also won't notice you using your pants.
Entries.ABDLChild_fallback: #$p 102#What's your name?|%You hear a crinkle with each step Vincent takes.
Entries.spring_12_1: The egg hunt is tomorrow! I'm gonna find so many!$1#$e#I'm a good finder.
Entries.spring_12_2: The egg hunt is tomorrow! I'm gonna find so many!$1#$e#I'm a good finder.
Entries.spring_Mon10: #$p 102#I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up!|I think I need my diaper changed, but I'm gonna wait until Mommy checks me.#$e#I don't mind being messy a bit longer!$1
Entries.spring_Tue: #$p 102#*sigh*... Mommy won't let me have any more gummies today.$s|I like it better when Miss Penny reads to us.
Entries.spring_Tue10: #$p 102#Don't tell Mommy... but you're my favorite grown-up.$h|I found a frog and put it in my diaper.#$b#It's a surprise for mommy!$1#$e#%Vincent looks like he's being tickled.
Entries.spring_Wed2: #$p 102#I wanna look for bugs, but Mommy gets mad when I'm all dirty.$u|Mommy told me I can still be her little baby boy if I wasn't ready to grow up yet.#$e#I love my Mommy!$1
Entries.spring_Thu: #$p 102#I'm hungry... where's Mommy?$s|%You notice Vincent's diaper peeking out of his waistband.#$e#Hi @!$1
Entries.spring_Thu6: #$p 102#You're not as boring as most grown-ups!|%You notice Vincent's diaper peeking out of his waistband.#$b#%When he sees you he giggles and pats his crinkly bottom.
Entries.spring_Thu10: #$p 102#You're not as boring as most grown-ups!|%You notice Vincent's diaper peeking out of his waistband.#$b#%When he sees you he giggles and pats his crinkly bottom.#$e#%You just barely notice a squish.
Entries.spring_Fri2: #$p 102#Oh no... Mommy's making lentil soup tonight.$s|Sam says I'm still his cute little baby brother.#$e#%Vincent wiggles in glee.
Entries.spring_Fri_inlaw_Sam: #$p 102#Oh no... Mommy's making lentil soup tonight.$s|How's my brother doing?#$e#Can you tell him he can still borrow my stuffies if he wants?$3#$b#I don't want him to be scared.$2
Entries.spring_Sat8: #$p 102#Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week.$s|Jas pooped in her pull ups at the library yesterday!#$e#She blamed it on me and Ms. Penny believed her.$2#$e#I was pretty messy though.$3
Entries.spring_Sun4: #$p 102#Hi there!|I can tie my own shoes now, but sometimes I ask Mommy to do it for me anyway.#$e#I like how it makes her all smiley!$1
Entries.summer_Mon4: #$p 102#I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up!|Jas only pretends to be a big girl.$3
Entries.summer_Mon8: #$p 102#I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up!|Jas only pretends to be a big girl.$3#$e#Pull ups are basically just diapers anyway.
Entries.summer_Tue: #$p 102#*sigh*... Mommy won't let me have any more gummies today.$s|My teddy bear's name is Squishy.#$e#I like him a lot!$1
Entries.summer_Tue_inlaw_Penny: #$p 102#*sigh*... Mommy won't let me have any more gummies today.$s|Does Miss Penny change your diapers too?#$e#She says I gotta try and use the potty more, but if I do she won't change me anymore.$2
Entries.summer_Wed10: #$p 102#I wanna look for bugs, but Mommy gets mad when I'm all dirty.$u|@! I wanna show you something cool!#$e#%Vincent squats down shamelessly, grunting softly while you watch his pants droop.#$e#All done!$1
Entries.summer_Thu6: #$p 102#You're not as boring as most grown-ups!|Mommy wants me to try using the potty, but I don't wanna.$3#$b#It's scary, and I don't wanna be a big kid yet.$2
Entries.summer_Fri2: #$p 102#Ew, it's boiled beet night again...$s|%Vincent is sucking on his thumb and humming happily to himself.#$e#Hi @!$1
Entries.summer_Fri10: #$p 102#I wanna look for bugs, but Mommy gets mad when I'm all dirty.$u|%Vincent is sucking on his thumb and humming happily to himself.#$e#%You notice him pause for a minute, his free hand resting on his diaper, a faint blush on his cheeks, and a little grin behind his thumb.#$e#Ahhhh.
Entries.summer_Sat10: #$p 102#Don't tell Mommy... but you're my favorite grown-up.$h|I found a frog and put it in my diaper.#$b#It's a surprise for mommy!$1#$e#%Vincent looks like he's being tickled.
Entries.summer_Sun2: #$p 102#Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week.$s|Sometimes, when I'm bored, I like to play with my old baby toys.
Entries.fall_Mon4: #$p 102#I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up!|Jas keeps bragging about being in pull ups.#$e#I miss when we were in diapers together.$2
Entries.fall_Tue10: #$p 102#*sigh*... Mommy won't let me have any more gummies today.$s|Wanna know a secret?#$e#I don't wanna stop wearing diapers.$3#$e#Mommy says it's okay if I'm not ready yet!$1
